org.waag.histograph.graph

Class GraphInit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waag.histograph.graph.GraphInit

  • public class GraphInit
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class initializing the Neo4j graph connection. This includes setting up indices if they did not exist and the server for the Neo4j front end page in which Cypher queries can be executed.
    Author:
    Rutger van Willigen, Bert Spaan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphInit()

      static org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService initNeo4j(Configuration config)
      Static method that initializes the Neo4j graph based on a Configuration parameter and returns the GraphDatabaseService associated object.

    • Method Detail

      • initNeo4j

        public static org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService initNeo4j(Configuration config)
                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Static method that initializes the Neo4j graph based on a Configuration parameter and returns the GraphDatabaseService associated object.
        Parameters:
        config - The Configuration object in which Neo4j file paths and ports should be specified.
        Returns:
        The GraphDatabaseService object of the initialized Neo4j graph.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the graph database could not be started at the given file path.
